Headline: #60 Blue Island/26th Temporary Reroute at 26th/Rockwell
ShortDescription: 60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily rerouted via 26th, California, Cermak, Western and 26th due to, street blockage near 26th/Rockwell.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via26th, California, Cermak, Western and 26th due to, street blockage near 26th/Rockwell.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #12 Roosevelt Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Roosevelt/Ashland
ShortDescription: Eastbound 12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted via Roosevelt, Ashland, Taylor, Racine, and Roosevelt due to, fire dept. activity near Roosevelt/Ashland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted via Roosevelt, Ashland, Taylor, Racine, and Roosevelt due to, fire dept. activity near Roosevelt/Ashland.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #75 74th-75th Temporary Reroute at 74th/Loomis
